definition: To provide the necessary funds or financial support for a particular endeavor, project, or venture. This term is commonly used when referring to the act of securing monetary resources to enable the implementation or continuation of a specific undertaking.

examples.english: I want to finance my studies.
We need to finance the project.

examples.german: Sie haben einen Kredit aufgenommen, um ihr Haus zu finanzieren.
examples.english: They took out a loan to finance their house.

examples.german: Die Regierung plant, den Bau der Autobahn zu finanzieren.
examples.english: The government plans to finance the construction of the highway.

examples.german: Die Firma hat beschlossen, das neue Produkt selbst zu finanzieren.
examples.english: The company has decided to finance the new product themselves.
